name: No need to finish the game
name_original: No need to finish the game
description:
This might be a horror game

It might be a family friendly game. You decide. It might be none of them. You'll find out. Just know that no matter what happens in the game, nothing really is what it seams to be.

I EXPECT THE GAME TO TAKE 5 MINUTES TO FINISH

You'll know when it is over

h a v e f u n : D

also, I've made every single asset in this game from scratch, everything else than the gun in the end :D 

here's the gun: https://www.turbosquid.com/FullPreview/Index.cfm/ID/724710
